_header: Upon a summer Sunday see I the sun
_description: ’Somer Soneday’ — 133 lines in 13-line stanzas alternating with ‘Versus’ of 8 short lines

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
[O]pon a somer soneday se I þe sonneErly risinde in þe
                    est ende…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…A bare body in a bed a bere ibrouth him byA duk drawe to
                    þe deþ wiþ drouping and dare
